citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
Although the facility provides enrichment to the birds, it does not have an environment enhancement plan in place to
promote the psychological wellbeing of the screech owl and crow at the facility. Exhibitors must develop, document, and
follow a species-appropriate plan for environment enhancement adequate to promote the psychological well-being of
birds at the facility that is within industry standards. The plan must be approved by the attending veterinarian and must
address the social groupings of the birds, physical environmental enrichment of the enclosure and any special
considerations. This plan should remain at the facility for review at subsequent inspections.
Correct by: Oct 24, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

address the social groupings of the birds, physical environmental enrichment of the enclosure and any special 
considerations. This plan should remain at the facility for review at subsequent inspections.
